front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event Notification Extension for Notification Throttling

abstract.t: This memo specifies the throttle, forge and average mechanisms foradjusting the rate of Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) eventnotifications. These mechanisms can be applied in subscriptions toall SIP event packages, but in particular the throttle mechanism isespecially designed to be used in combination with a subscription toa Resource List Server (RLS).
